title: Table 76 - Row 2
clause_text: Criteria: Access road of 13.0m. and above | Permissible in situ FSI: 4.00 or up to sanctioned FSI of the scheme, whichever is higher. Relaxation in marginal open spaces as required under regulation 41(5)(a)(iii) shall be granted by CEO (SRA) in case of demonstrable hardship. However, minimum Joint Open Space of 9m for buildings having height above 32m & up to 70m and 12m between two adjacent buildings for buildings having height above 70m but below 120 m shall be insisted. For buildings having height above120 m, joint open space between two adjacent buildings shall be 15 m, however CEO (SRA) shall in case of hardship relax it to 12m after recording reasons in writing. The relaxations granted shall be subject to compliance of requirements of CFO’s NOC.

values: 4.00 or up to sanctioned FSI of the scheme, whichever is higher. The relaxations granted shall be subject to compliance of requirements of CFO’s NOC.
